repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This manuscript consists of a commenatary on the Uttararāmāyaṇa of the Valmili-rāmāyaṇa. It is a very abrupt commentary. The manuscript is incomplete, it ends in the with beggining of commentary on 59th Sarga of Uttararāmāyaṇa.
The front cover with title : uttararāmāyaṇavyākhyā at the centre. śrirāmā …. (Few akṣaras are covered by the shelf mark sticker.) jo ? ṇe vat rāmānujāya After the guard folio one folio half broken and edges are damaged. Some matter in Sanskrit in Grantha script. It seems to be some part of commentary.
Back side of the front cover some matter in Sanskrit and carved in Grantha script. Line 1 śrimahāgaṇapataye

msItem.title: Uttararāmāyaṇavyākhyā
msItem.incipit: ? vat prathamaṁ nāradena saṁkṣepata upadiṣṭaṁ nijayamamaprabhāvena yathā vada dṛṣṭaṁ nāma caritram śatakoṭi pravistaraguhyaṁ pratipāditaṁ
msItem.explicit:
. paritatām pari
vṛtyānyatra vyāptām prasāditasyośanas sakāśādviparivṛtya jarāmanyatra saṁkramaṇa yogyām prāptassan ityarthaḥ paramikā? adhikāṁ bhogatṛpyai? na ?? suptā vi[ṣa]

support.p: Broken cover. first guard leaf is supported with inserting thin palm leaves. Guard leaf and palm leaves are joined with a thread using the string whole of the palm leaf. Second guard folio also broken. Two palm leaves are glue together to strengthen the guard folio. Fragile.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 56 written folio. 1 half broken blank folio.

supportDesc.foliation:
Tamil letter numerals in the left margin. 1 -55 numbered.
is blank and unnumbered. Mansucript ends at
.
supportDesc.condition: Edges are broken of some folio.

handNote.desc: Strokes are misxed with the following letters and the sign of ṛkāra or the cluster words are manytimes mixed with the following next line. difficult to read many words.

additions.desc: Uttararāmāyaṇavyākhyā is written at the centre of the front cover.
Old shelf mark 30 in pink pencil.
Back side of the front cover some matter in Sanskrit and carved in Grantha script. Line 1 śrimahāgaṇapataye |

encodingDesc.p: ?? are used to show the unclear letters. [] is used to the letter which is speculated.

TEI.text:
vat prathamaṁ nāradena saṁkṣepata upadiṣṭaṁ nijayamamaprabhāvena yathā vada dṛṣṭaṁ nāma caritram śatakoṭi pravistaraguhyaṁ pratipāditaṁ
| paritatām pari
vṛtyānyatra vyāptām prasāditasyośanas sakāśādviparivṛtya jarāmanyatra saṁkramaṇa yogyām prāptassan ityarthaḥ paramikā adhikāṁ bhogatṛpyai na suptā vi[ṣa]
